Welcome

At Prince of Tarts we are constantly innovating our products to deliver the highest quality products. The process of blending fresh ingredients with our passion has evolved the bakery into what it has been shaped into today. Recipes are derived from months and years of trial and error to create the desirables that you've all come to know and love. We appreciate the support from friends, family and loyal clients over the years. We will continue to do our best.

Join the Journey
